description: This file defines a layout component for a Qwik-based web application, including HTTP request handling, server-side data loading, and component composition with header, footer, and slot for nested content.

methods.name: onGet
methods.description: Handles GET requests with caching directives to optimize performance and reduce hosting costs.

methods.name: useServerTimeLoader
methods.description: A route loader that provides the current server time as ISO string.
